subject: CNN Alerts: bush
body:
CNN Alerts: bush






 



Alert Name: bush
Rough week puts Bush on his heels

05/11/07 10:31 PM, EDT
Despite a week when he was clearly playing defense on his Iraq war policy, President Bush nevertheless rallied the party faithful Thursday night with a mantra he has uttered many times before -- failure is not an option in Iraq.
FULL STORY
